comments.summ: Lovely t-shirt, but not for me
comments.phra: I love the color. I have quite a few of these t-shirts, but somehow this one seemed very big so I sent it back. It is a nice shirt and EF great material.

This EILEEN FISHER Vee-Neck Organic Cotton Tee is an excellent summer tee shirt. The Vee-Neck is a perfect cool stylish shape. Hits me in just the right places ! I like it so much, I have it in several colors. Easy to wash and dry, too !
Love the color!!! Comfortable, soft cotton tea. Perfect for summer!
The magenta color is a little darker than shown. It is gorgeous!
Love EF tees wth different necklines and short sleeve variations. They wash great. Love the assortment of colors.

I have many Eileen Fisher garments and this one looks like I got it at a discount store. It is not well made and absolutely not worth $68. I bought the XS, a size I often wear in Eileen garments but it is large and sloppy. Unfortunately, I washed it, following the instructions on the tag, so it can't be returned. It now looks like I've had it for decades.
Gigantic even in a xxs. Ridiculously low and gaping vee; boxy fit. Pajama top maybe. I reordered a different EF vee tee and it fits perfect.
Nicely made and very comfortable.
Nice material and neckline, but VERY boxy. I returned it.

This is my second EF V-Tee like this, and I did size down, but this one wasn't as over-sized as the other. Just saying for those that like roomier T's. The color, ceramic, is perfect. Very light weight.
Classic Eileen Fisher t-shirt. It is soft and comfortable. I went down a size L instead of XL for a more streamlined fit. It will become a staple in my closet. Nice for warm fall days in Texas.

comments.summ: This one isn't as nice as some other EF tees
comments.phra: I have ordered every Eileen Fisher tee that is available in an olive color, but the two current models that are made in the organic cotton (the lower priced ones) are just not as nice as the ones costing twice as much. The fit is a bit off, and the fabric just doesn't feel or look as nice as it should. I returned this and one other but kept the 2 more expensive tees.

It's a basic tee. Breezy and light and I like that it is organic. The Jewel color is very pretty. This tee runs very large, even for Eileen Fisher. As with all EF clothes, I ordered a size down from my normal size and could have gone down another size for a more classic fit.

comments.phra: Very stretchy and very comfortable. They are my new go-to jeans. The extra band in the waist gives support for the tummy. Perfect length for cropping up or wearing full-length.
I love this brand for style, comfort, and fit. The elastic in the waist is hidden, but it makes such a difference in comfort. I have many Wit & Wisdom Ab-solution jeans, and I love them all!
Love this brand in their pants. Their jeans are not skinny enough and I had to return them. The material & color were great.

These pants were recommended by a friend and they do not disappoint. The perfect comfy jean. Stylish enough to dress up or just hang out for a casual day of wear. No sagging or worrying about the waistline opening when you sit.
Love the style and sizing but what is that odor??? I kept them in hopes of washing the smell out but so far no luck. Hope it fades with more washes
Very stretchy and very comfortable. They are my new go-to jeans. The extra band in the waist gives support for the tummy. Perfect length for cropping up or wearing full-length.
I love this brand for style, comfort, and fit. The elastic in the waist is hidden, but it makes such a difference in comfort. I have many Wit & Wisdom Ab-solution jeans, and I love them all!
Love this brand in their pants. Their jeans are not skinny enough and I had to return them. The material & color were great.

These pants were recommended by a friend and they do not disappoint. The perfect comfy jean. Stylish enough to dress up or just hang out for a casual day of wear. No sagging or worrying about the waistline opening when you sit.

comments.summ: Flattering and a good fit for curves
comments.phra: Love these jeans! They are so comfortable and the waist band doesn’t bother me at all. Very flattering, my full thighs and large toosh fit! I normally wear a size 8/9, ordered an 8 they tend to loosen up a little so size down for the proper fit (I prefer mine just a tad less tight)
Just right for a curvy gal. I'm 5"4 so high rise sometimes feel a bit pouchy but these mid rise are just right. Just great stretch to be able to dance, bowl or sit for a three hour movie.
Comfortable jeans but ended up returning because the navy was more comfortable.

This jeans are sooo comfy! They have a little more stretch than I was expecting. I'm usually an 8-10 (5'5"/155lb). I got a size 10, but I would probably go for a size 8 on my next purchase just because they have a good bit of give.
I didn't really like the color, it looks too washed out and unflattering I ended up returning it.
I love these pants. They fit perfect in the waist and the length. They do stretch in the knee area but that is ok with me as I get extra room later in the day when I need it.
The material is really stretchy which is what I look for in all my pants. At the sale price, I'd definitely buy more.
Nice quality, nice color. Runs small so may need to size up.

The first pair of these jeans I ordered I instantly fell in love! I want them in every color! These jeans wash up beautifully as well. They are the most comfortable pair of jeans I’ve ever owned! You will not be disappointed if you purchase these jeans!! Can’t wait to order more of this brand!

I love these jeans! They are my second pair however, my first pair faded soooo fast. They now look gray instead of black. I am so disappointed. The fit of these is amazing and the really are my favorite if they would just stay black!

comments.summ: Good fit at waist. Baggy legs. Defect in dye.
comments.phra: The jeans, which are a stretch jegging, fit great in the waist and thigh then for some odd reason get wide at the knee and calf. My pair also had an odd darkness with the wash. So below the zipper area wasn’t a faded grey like the rest of the jeans but a dark black making it look like I dropped something in my lap, or that I wet myself (not good!!).

Love these jeans, this is the second pair of Wit & Wisdom jeans I have bought and love the first pair as much as the second. They do fit slightly big, only slightly, which is why I have rated them a 4 vs 5 star.

comments.summ: Great jeans but shorter girls needs petite length
comments.phra: Super soft!! Perfect mid rise jean. Unfortunately too long for my 5'2 frame. I had to return them and they were out of the petite.

comments.summ: Good pants, maybe not true denim look.
comments.phra: Loved the waistband of these. It really did tuck in my love handles, which is one of the reasons I wanted them. I felt they were nice quality and worth the price. I took off 1 star because I did end up returning them, but due to length and look of them. They looked more like pants vs jeans. I really wanted a black jean look. Even with that, I would have kept them if they had been the length I wanted. I have a 32 inseam for bootcut jeans and saw these were a 30. However, once on, I realized I wanted a short pant look and the 30 went right to my ankles. Just not the overall look I was needing.

These jeans are so comfortable and wear so well. The color is more of a washed out black than grey, but they are still very pretty. This was my first Wit & Wisdom purchase, but it will not be my last!

Great super skinny jean. I Wish I didn’t read the reviews...size down..they run big? I sized down and they were to tight in the waist( muffin top) I was so disappointed. The jean material was stretchy but not to stretchy. The color was great and overall fit was perfect! I had to return!
Quality is lacking in these compared to other Wit & Wisdom pants I own. They were very stiff. The stitching on the pair I got was half blue and half black which was strange. Returned.

This is my second pair of wit and wisdom ab solution. I do believe this pair ran a bit larger than my first. They are also a bit longer in length on me and I liked that. I ordered a size 8reg and ended up returning for a size 6. I am 5’6” and 140 for reference.

These are the most comfortable jeans I’ve ever owned. I’ve spent more money on other brands and styles only to fuss the whole day. Not these. I originally bought the size suggested, but ending up going to the store and exchanged for the size I usually wear.
Disappointed. I love the color of these jeans but unfortunately they are really baggy in the knee area and do not fit like the pic.
Super comfy jeans. If you’re in between sizes I would recommend sizing down for the skinny look and feel. Material is soft and the color is a nice dark gray.
They were just okay. I didn’t love the color; it reminded me of 80s worn black jeans. I also thought they were a little long on me for skinny jeans.

I have several pair of these Jeans and love them. They fit great and are comfortable to be in all day. THey wash well and have been very happy with them especially for the price. Please bring these back.
True to size, flattering fit pair of jeans. I tend to buy boxie jeans. These jeans are not boxie. The give me a figure. Stylish and great color. Awesome price point.
bought for my daughter and she loved. Is a little big, but she wanted to keep

comments.summ: denim heaven looks and feels good
comments.phra: love these as well. I have gained weight but I do feel slimmer in black. These feel like a slice of denim heaven

I wanted to buy a pair of jeans that weren't black or blue, I love these because they are a new and exciting color. They fit true to size, I can wear 29 or 30, I'm 5'7" and 135, I also purchased them on sale so that is a plus. I plan to wear with black boots, a black sweater and a leather jacket. I'm a huge fan of Wit and Wisdom because of the price, quality and fit compared to my expensive jeans. If you are unsure- try them! You will love them!
The fit is great but the smell, like black ink from a publishing company, is awful and I have washed it twice and the smell won’t go away. People can smell you before hey see you, Beware!

comments.summ: Not a good fit for me
comments.phra: Nice jeans but did not fit me as well as the W&W high rise jeans. I normally wear a curvy fit so they may fit a straighter body type better.

comments.summ: Love the petite fit of these jeans
comments.phra: I am short! Tohese jeans are perfect length in petite. I love the fit and the fact that they can be dressed up or down!

These are really comfortable and true to size. I thought the length may be short, but they hit right above the ankle (I'm 5' 10"), so I kept them. I normally have a horrible time with jeans, but these are great! I am about 130 lbs and the 6 fits perfectly.
I weigh 140 and 5’7. Bought my usual size 10. I would consider the fit true to size. They were a little short and the fit seemed off for me. I was hoping they would work, but ended up returning.
The black aren’t as short as the ones I have in blue denim & white. Plus, these have a funky smell despite having washed them. I’m hopeful the small goes away after I wash a few more times.
Nice jeans. But had to return, because it was way too high-rise for my taste.

comments.summ: 1st Time Buyer ~ Wit & Wisdom Ab-solution Jeans
comments.phra: Finally bit the bullet and purchased a pair of Wit and Widsom jeans. I may never purchase another brand. Super comfortable.
These are the most comfortable jeans I've ever worn. Looks like jeans, but feel like leggings and they hold you in without being uncomfortable.
Absolutely love! They fit perfectly and the hidden waistband that adjusts to a woman’s daily changes is amazing. They are soft and my favorite go to brand now!!

comments.summ: Great but I had to return
comments.phra: High quality. Great waistband. Runs small.

I wanted to love these since a blogger I follow recommended and I usually love her recommendations. When I got these they fit pretty well. They were a little big in the waist and tight in the leg, a common problem for me. I had a size 4, I’m 5’6” and 128 lbs. The reason I returned was the fabric was itchy and uncomfortable to me.

I ordered the wrong style of Wit & Wisdom jeans. These are very stretchy, very legging-like and shiny. They run true to size. I am returning for the less stretchy and shiny style. Still good quality and fit. Just make sure you know which style you are ordering.
I love these black jeans! They are very comfortable and forgiving in the waist.
These are the best jeans! They stretch in the right places and they are super comfortable.

Best jeans ever! I had to immediately go online and order another pair. I have tried every brand of jean over the years and spent tons of money trying to find the perfect fit! Finally....these jeans are flattering, don’t sag after a day ( or three) of wearing them. The comfort level Is amazing. I can’t say enough about these jeans.
Beautiful color and styling however, the calves are much too tight. I am a fit 58 year old, average to low weight, but needed to return these. They are more a legging than a jean.
These jeans are pretty comfortable and look cute with an oversized shirt. I am short (5'2) and I prefer the ankle length to the regular length for booties and sandles.
Classic black pants but I like the jeans much better- the material seems less soft and stretchy. Still a big W&W fan!

These are very comfortable, stretchy and flattering on. I ordered a size down (size 6) because my usual size 8 was out of stock. They fit great. I love the ab-solution technology and the price on these is so reasonable. I will continue to order from this brand.

Best jeans ever! I had to immediately go online and order another pair. I have tried every brand of jean over the years and spent tons of money trying to find the perfect fit! Finally....these jeans are flattering, don’t sag after a day ( or three) of wearing them. The comfort level Is amazing. I can’t say enough about these jeans.
Beautiful color and styling however, the calves are much too tight. I am a fit 58 year old, average to low weight, but needed to return these. They are more a legging than a jean.

These are so comfortable and really flattering. I had so many compliments the first night I wore them. They are also a lot cooler than most black jeans so it is an excellent option for the warmer months.
I love these pants! I'm 5'4" and 125 lbs. I have a boyish frame with no hips. These are the only pants that stay where they belong on my waist. Thay are super comfortable and have a bit of stretch.

Just purchased my third pair of wit and wisdom skinny jeans. These are the only non-legging pants I’m currently sporting post-partum. They are comfy and forgiving. Feel like butter. You won’t regret this purchase.
Material Is nice and stretchy. Feels great to wear

Great pants with stretch and wonderful support. These pants can be easily dressed up or down. I personally find that the ankles are tighter than they appear in the photo. Be sure to wash them inside out as the black will begin to fade overtime.

Love these. Have the ankle absolution in white- I would have preferred those but they were out of stock. The fit was too good to pass up though. Great for thise times I want a jean fit but need something more pant like.
Love the fit (one size down). Love the price. But even though I washed them inside out in cold water they have faded after just a few washes.
Love the comfort waist band and the denim has a slight stretch to it, these are a great everyday jean!
Wit and Wisdom is now my favorite brand of jeans. These are the second pair I have bought. The Absolution waist is perfect. Don’t have to constantly pull the waist up all day.
Fit well, slimming, don’t bag-out, comfortable, my new go-to jeans. Got em on sale in gray & denim blue. Yes!

I really wanted to like these jeans especially the grey color. 5'2, 133 lbs.....ordered a 12 P first, too big, then a 10 P.....aargh I hate the gap at the back and they were way too tight around the calves. An 8 P would only be tighter in the calves. Nice material and waistband...too bad!

I’m glad I found this brand and these jeans. I feel like I’m hard to fit because my hips are narrow but my waist and legs are big. These are stretchy enough and high waisted enough that they don’t roll down and they give a slimmer profile. I love these jeans! I would size down maybe, because they do stretch.
These are the perfect jeans. The Ab-solute waste band is genius! It holds you in while not allowing the excess fat to roll over. I have these jeans in all lengths and colors. Love them!!
I love these jeans! Slim fit without being too tight and uncomfortable and really flattering.
I love Wit and Wisdom jeans! The tummy control is flattering without feeling bulky. The price is fantastic too! I would definitely buy again!

I purchased these pants in a size 2, anticipating the "upsizing" of America (sometimes I wear a size 4). They fit PERFECTLY and they are comfortable, and very easy to move in. I am thrilled and have found that this brand is definitely one to keep on my watch list. VERY happy. And the price on these was very reasonable! Win win.

These jeans are a PERFECT fit and stylish. I ordered a 14 petite in both the grey and denim, figuring that I would be lucky if I kept one pair. I kept both...they are amazingly stylish with the Kut waterfall jackets and the vince camuto take 2 zipper jacket. The jeans are very inexpensive for the quality look!! (My first time ordering the Wit and Wisdom label from Nordstrom)
I get so many compliments when I wear these! Super slimming and they fit perfectly, Also I love these in dark grey but am def thinking of getting these in more colors!
Great fit for me, but only the skinny ankle petite because I'm five feet tall.

These jeans are fantastic! They provided enough stretch without stretching out like some other higher priced jeans. Even though I am slim and wear a 4P, I still have a small "muffin top". The waistband is thicker and is high enough that I don't have the urge to keep readjusting. Love these jeans - my new favorite brand!

This is my first pair of Wit & Wisdom jeans and I love them! They mold my body with not being super tight. The fabric is super soft and the color is a rich, dark blue. I purchased them at a fabulous prize so I would highly recommend this pair of jeans to all friends and family.

I hadn't heard of these pants until they came up on the 10 best list of Skinny Jeans that Make you Look Great! With the added bonus of them being on sale, and it stated, "they never go on sale"! I just had to get a pair. All the reviews said to downsize one size, I should have gone down two, but they aren't too big, they fit great out of the wash and I doubt I could get a smaller size on, it's just after a few hours I find myself tugging them up. I need a nice belt to keep them from the little slide they like to do. I don't think they are as flattering as another pair I have from the list, but they have one thing going for them others don't, they are the most comfortable jeans I have ever worn in my life! I have literally fallen asleep in these on my bed and not bothered to take them off and worn them like pajama bottoms under the covers. They are that comfortable, enough so that I don't rush to change after work into more comfortable clothes, like I do with everything else, including jeans, that I wear to work.

They feel really comfortable, but after buying my regular size they were way too big. :( They also had this weird tighter fit in my calves. I returned them, but will probably try them again sometime soon. :)
Love these jeans. The fit so well, and they are soft. I got the grey and love the color.

I just got rid of my black skinny jeans because they where old faded and cutting into my waist.These Wit and Wisdoms are awesome,they have a stretchy waist band,they are also not bulky under clothes.I wore them with high boot and they fit perfect under the boot.
very comfortable fit, these are my favorite pair of jeans
Absolutely LOVE these jeans! I’ve bought them in several colors. The fit is perfect and yet they’re so comfortable!!! I rave about them to my friends!
Love these!! Super comfortable!

These are nice quality jeans but just wasn't for me. I'm look to replace "everyday" jeans so wanted a flattering but comfortable fit. I ordered these jeans in my normal size. They were really tight and I didn't care for the elastic band around the waist. The length was good for me (5'4'' 120lbs & typically a sz 4) but would be too short for taller women. As other reviewers mentioned, the calves were oddly tight as well. I would recommend ordering the next size up.

Great jeans. Great price range. For me too tight on the calves and didn't like the restricted feeling. I know they are skinny but way too skinny for me personally (I have more of an athletic build). No gaps at waistline, but I didn't like the waistband thing.......to clingy for my personal liking. Well made and understand why people like them.

FINALLY a pair of jeans that flatters my post c-section body without the waistband coming up to my armpits. the material is stretchy and flexible but also feels substantial enough to withstand washing. I'm 5'2/115 and ordered a 0; I need to roll these up about an inch or two when I wear them with booties. The pockets are real (thank you!) and the wash is versatile. I wear these frequently, and feel confident when I do!

I love these pants so much. I would buy a size smaller than your true size. They fit great. I can wear them all day and they look just as good at the end of the day. The Black is nice and dark and sleek. Love them.
Very comfortable pants that you can wear for any occasion.

I have been wearing this brand for several years, and recently updated my jeans with the new flattering waist...but even tho the waist is better, the rest of the jeans seam to be a bit bigger than my old ones. they are still the best ever and maybe next time I will go down a size. they stretch nicely and I love the thin denim material. I have them also in black and light blue, and the older model I have in red and in purple. once you try these you will never wear another
The best, most comfortable jeans I own! I love the absolution band at the top that makes me feel comfortable and tucked in! These are great if you have curves!

Wish I had nicer things to say about this line. I had purchased the same pair but had to return because of a mark on the leg. I replaced them with the same exact style and size and when I got home they were too short and I could barely get them on. .
I love these jeans! They are very comfortable and have just enough stretch so they keep their shape. The Absolution feature helps flatten the tummy.

I love these jeans. They are definitely the most comfortable pair I have ever bought, my thighs are not thin and most jeans make they look even larger, not these, cannot say enough good things about them. Will definitely be buy more like if offered in other colors. Would recommend to my friends and family.

These jeans are game changers! Super comfy, with a wide elastic waistband, that prevents gapping at the back. The fit is fab, with just the right amount of stretch. I loved the first pair so much, I bought another pair in a second color the day after the first ones arrived. And, I spread the word to some friends. Last rave--the price-point is great! Affordable jeans that are as comfortable as they are flattering??? Sign me up!

These jeans are amazing! I am 5’2”, 130 and the 6p fit great. I took a chance and ordered on a whim, I have a terrible time finding pants that fit and look good. The length is perfect (right at ankle), and they are snug but not skin tight. I’ve worn them a few times now and they don’t stretch out at all during the day. I like the mid rise and I found the waist to be comfortable. Very flattering, I will definitely be ordering more of this brand.

comments.summ: Material not as nice as others in the line
comments.phra: These seem fine, but are not as luxuriously stretchy as the darker fabric in the Ab-Solution line (in my small sample anyway), and I find the whiskering on the front to be a bit too much. I agree you should size down. I am 5’4.75” and ~130 lbs and the size 4 were probably the right fit in the waist accounting for stretch, just not the most comfortable. The 4 was also much too long, trying the petite next.

These fit TTS, maybe a little big. I generally wear a 25 in Madewell, Citizens and Mother Jeans, bought a 0 in these. Loved them at first, the slimming pockets are great!! However, over time I found they stretched out and faded, now my black jeans look aged and saggy. Disappointing, I’ve had them for less than a year and only wash in cold water, and hang these to dry.

The elastic waistband on these jeans are my absolute favorite part of these jeans. They allow for comfort around the waist while maintaining the fitted shape throughout the rest of the pants. These were so perfect for Thanksgiving and will be perfect to wear while eating all those holiday treats.

As a woman in her mid fifties (and yes I’m post menapausaul) , I’ve been in search for a pair of jeans that are not only comfortable but flattering. I still wear a size 6, however my shape is definitely not the same. Truthfully, I was a little skeptical as the price point of theses jeans and the reviews seemed almost too good to be true. As soon as I tried them on, I liked the way they felt. The jeans do a nice job of slimming my tummy without looking like I am wearing a pair of “old lady” (as my daughter would call them ) pants. They held their shape all day and I wasn’t having to continually pull them up. I have already ordered the black ones and can’t wait for them to arrive. Great job !
Sadly these didn’t work out for me, despite all the amazing reviews. The length was too short and the crotch was shorter than I’d like. Good quality and color though! Just not for me.
These jeans fit perfectly and look great on. The show curves but are not tight fitting. Absolute best fit!
Nordstrom's website said these pants ran big and to order one size down. I did that and the pants were too small. I thought the pants were true to size.

comments.summ: Not quite what I wanted/quality a bit off
comments.phra: Not quite what I expected. These jeans were a little too snug and shoes bumps on the backside a little too much. The fabric was on the thin side, and a couple of the belt loops were loose. I didn't want to take a chance that the quality would continue to deteriorate, so I ended up buying a similar pair from a different brand.
Best skinnies , so comfortable . Great color . I sized up , but I always do in a skinny jean. Did not stretch out like some do, will definitely be ordering this brand again

I love these pants so much, I have them in 3 colors. The jeans I just got are a great dark wash. They have a perfect fit and are really flattering. Wit and Wisdom is a quality brand and well priced. Very happy with these purchases.

comments.summ: Awesome, but too long for me
comments.phra: Fit was great, held you in and just enough stretch to be comfortable all day long. These would have been winners if they were not so long on me. I ordered the 4P (my normal size is 26, 2P) and the fit was absolutely perfect, but needed to be about 2-3" shorter for my 5'3" height. Returned.
Great fit, comfortable and lots of stress. Only downside is they seem to stretch throughout the day so may be able to size down.
Love these jeans. Stretchy yet keeps there shape. I bought a few pairs. Great color too.

I ordered them in a 6, but usually wear a 4 in jeans. I think the 4 would fit a little better so I would say they are true to size. I love that they aren't ankle pants which usually end up being too short for me. I'm 5'6" and this length was great. I love the waist band that is comfortable and yet holds you in. They are perfect for dressing up or dressing down. My favorite pair of black jeans I've ever owned for sure!`
These jeans are so soft and comfortable, exactly what I was looking for. They have a nice stretch to them and the don't lose their shape throughout the day.
Wit and Wisdom is my go to brand for a great fitting jean at a reasonable price. I love the dark wash on this Indigo pair. As always the Ab-solution waist is super comfortable and smoothing.
I didn't love the fit. They wrinkled and gapped in weird places on me.

Upon wearing them the first time I noticed a lose thread on the inner thigh seam. I was able to make a small knot and cut the ends off. Even though this made me question the quality I decided to keep them because I think they’re cute and comfortable. Now that I’ve worn them on and off for about 2 weeks I’ve just noticed another pulled thread in the front. I don’t know if only my pair is bad, but I’ll return them.

These are my new favorite brand of jeans. The elastic waistband makes them very comfortable. I am between sizes, I usually wear 2-4, I ordered the 2 and they fit perfectly! These jeans are going to be my go to for fall.
These jeans are great! Very comfortable and hold their shape well. Flattering even for curvy girls. The only complaint is the stinky smell. Hoping it washes out.
Great Color! True to size. I am a petite and the length was great.

i love these jeans! they help to lift my butt and relieve my muffin top. they’re also comfortable. although it was suggested they run large and order a size down, i didn’t find that was the case. i’d say they run a tad large but not enough so where it’s a whole size larger. i’m 5’ 7” and 140 lbs., a pretty true 8 in jeans. i love that these jeans weren’t expensive, unlike other brands today.
Great option for black jeans. Comfortable and stretchy. The Ab-solution technology allows them to sit comfortably at your waistline. Would recommend sizing up.

Fit, comfort and wearability is why I purchase these stretch jeans. They are my "go to" jeans that work with shoes, boots, athletic shoes, sandals etc... They are heavier than a legging, but looks more like a jean. I have been ordering them every year for three years now!! If you are in between sizes, I would order the smaller size as there is stretch. The thicker waistband helps to conceal the "tummy bulge" I hope they never go away!!
Comfortable, lighter material that I prefer. Too many tags on the product, annoying when trying on. I'll be interested to see how they wear and wash.
Love these jeans! I am 5'3, however, and the petite are really short. They are more ankle pants- but they look great so I am keeping them. Would like to know if the regular size also runs shorter.
I love these jeans! Since my daughter my stomach is a little "softer" than it used to be so these are great because they don't create muffin tops.
These jeans are fabulous. I took the advice of others and ordered one size down and they fit perfectly. They are extremely comfortable and flexible.
These jeans are soft and comfortable enough to wear through an 8 hour day at the office. I'm 5' 1" and the petite hits just above the ankle.

These stretch skinny jeans fit great! They are the perfect color for fall and I know I'll wear them a lot. They are casual looking. Perfect for a football game, or, a farmer's market stroll. Also, they work well with a tall boot.
These jeans are so soft! They blow my $200+ jeans away not to mention they are actually comfortable! They do run large so size down!
Great fitting pants! They are very TTS in my opinion. They have good stretch, which is great because I have thick legs and a big booty. These are exactly what I was looking for!

My all-time favorite pair of pants! These feel amazing on and hug your body while making you feel so comfortable. I wore them to a cocktail party and paired them with a silk flowy top and peep toes and got so many compliments. They were a great length too. I can wear these anywhere--casual, dressy. They did not dig into my waist which was a huge plus! They did hug my calves a little more than other areas (like some other reviewers said) but I workout a lot too so I may just have bigger calves. Overall, worth every penny! If you want to look amazing and feel great at the same time--you cannot go wrong with these!
I absolutely love Wit & Wisdom jeans!! Perfect fit! These hold in all the right places! Petite sizes are perfect length if you are 5'2" or shorter

Love the fit of these pants. I needed something that would stretch and remain looking polished as I have a very active job that requires a business casual look. These pants have been great for building my own "uniform" without feeling dowdy. The cut is great, the waist is high, and the stretch is very comfy. Highly recommend for similar use.
I love these jeans - I already have them in multiple colors. I would definitely recommend them!
Way to go , Wit and Wisdom, for making this forty something look fabulous!!
Love these! Do recommend going down a size. Fit well and don't stretch out of shape during the day.

These jeans are comfy, flattering, and fit well. They are more like substantial leggings with pockets. I wore them to work since the material doesn't look like jeans. After having 2 kids, I really appreciate a slightly higher waist. The only reason I didn't give 5 starts is because they came down a bit after I was playing on the floor with my kids, so I had to pull them up every now and then.

I take an 8 or a 10 in Wit and Wisdom, 8 fit the best here. However I returned them because I did not like the fabric. It is very stretchy, I am sure they would be stretched out at the knees in minutes. It is just not a pleasant fabric to wear.
These skinny jeans are so comfortable. Some skinny jeans are just not comfortable. These are soft, yet have much control. True to size. Will buy in lighter color too.

I wanted to love be able to keep these - the fit was perfect and love the length. (I am 5'2). But y'all the smell was so, so bad. I read other reviews that said it didn't come out in the wash so I decided it wasn't worth keeping them. What a huge bummer! They would have been perfect :(

I really wanted to like these, they fit great and are comfortable and stretchy. However, there is this weird persisting dye smell that I can't get rid of after several washes and long soaks. It smells almost rubber-like and it gives me a headache when I wear them to work. Not sure if others have had this issue, but I've sadly decided I can't wear them anymore.

comments.summ: I want them in every color!
comments.phra: I bought these in black after getting them in blue. And I loooooove them. The material is thick and stretchy! so comfortable. They hold in any extra bulges you have in the hip region. Sizing runs normal but there is stretch so if you are between sizes I would size down.

comments.summ: Black runs smaller than blue denim
comments.phra: I might exchange my black pair for a size up, but these are still magic jeans!

Really excited to wear these for fall. Easily pair with boots or flats. Thick, stretchy material. I typically size up for skinny jeans, but these fit true to size (5'9", 150 lbs, ordered size 6). Hit at about ankle length for my height. Stretch allows for easy movement and comfort!

I bought these on the recommendation of my neighbor who loves these jeans. Unfortunately, they were not for me. They have a nice waistband which I imagine does a nice job of holding your tummy in. This is not my problem area. My issue is my big thighs, and unfortunately these did not flatter in that area.
These black jeans are snug yet comfortable. They don't bag and fit nicely.

I got two ab-solution jeans recently online and love the look and stretchy, soft material of them both. However these seem to run a size too small unlike the boot cut pair I got. They tend to give me a camel toe more than anything unlike the other pair... Very disappointed since I already washed them before the first wear and now I can't exchange/return them.
These jeans are so soft and comfortable. They are form fitting and fit perfectly. Love them and would recommend them to anyone that loves skinny jeans :)!!!

I ordered these pants because I'd been looking for some black jeans, and they were part of the Nordstrom Anniversary sale. They are extremely comfortable. Slightly stretchy and not too low cut, I can wear them to work for casual Friday. I chose my size based on Nordstrom's size finding option, and they fit perfectly.
I love the skinny jeans that I purchased. They fit very well!
Great jeans! Very flattering. Holds their shape and doesn't sag!

Last year I bought 2 pairs of the wit & wisdom jeans during the anniversary sale, and I love them! This year I ordered these in the same size as last year. When they came and I tried them on, I did not like them at all! They are super stretchy and tight...almost like leggings. Also, they are lower rise than last year. Maybe I should try the next size up, but I just don't love them like last year.
I believe I saw a recommendation for these on a blog, Schaefer Told Me To. Awesome jeans, fabulous fit, great quality! I purchased these in my regular size 8 (sometimes a 6). Highly recommend!

I love Wit and Wisdom jeans - I own several pairs but not sure about this one. I have the same Ab-solution skinny style in white and normal blue denim but this black pair has a strange smell. It's that funk dye smell. I don't know if washing it will remove it or not so I'm still deciding whether to keep or return them. The fit however is awesome!

comments.phra: My North Face jacket that I’ve had for over 10 years was at the end of its life at the start of this year so I was on a hunt for a new coat to keep me warm. I knew that I wanted a Canada Goose and had done alll my research and reviews. Before deciding on this parka, I had purchased the Shelburne Fusion Fit in a Medium and a Large, the Rossclair in a Large, and the Trillium in a Large. After trying each parka on and seeing which one fits the best and which features was a dealbreaker, I decided on the Rossclair. With the extreme cold in Chicago this week, the Rossclair has kept me warm! The fleece side pockets come in handy and the it’s deep enough to stick your keys or cellphone inside. The buttons are beautiful and give the parka a sleek look. The drawstrings inside give me shape and since I’m petite but still wanted a coat that’s long, the fusion fit is perfect. The Large allows me to wear a thick sweater underneath without the coat feeling too tight or snug. I’ve been wearing my Rossclair for about a week now and no regrets. I’ve had a lot of compliments on my parka. Best purchase ever and I hope to wear it for the the next 10-15 years!!

comments.summ: Love the Rossclair Fusion but NOT the thin fur!
comments.phra: I love the way Rossclair fusion fits to my shape! I am petite. I have tried on other styles but the fusion fits the best. I always have a problem with the sleeve being too long. I love everything about this jacket except the fur part is way too thin. It is not like other jacket which fur has more. It might be only this one. Therefore, I send it back and hopefully will find a better one.

I love everything about this jacket. It’s warm, length is perfect as I’m 5ft 2in, and the fit is perfect. I usually have a hard time finding a winter jacket that is warm enough but doesn’t make me look like buff person. I also love that there is a zipper in the back so when I go to sit my jacket doesn’t ride up or feel restricting around the waist. Overall, I’m impressed and would recommend!!

This parka was a gift for my wife. She loves it. She loves how comfortable it is, how warm it can keep her, but most of all she loves how fashionable it is. I love how the fusion fit shows off her figure still, and can be dressed up or down.

This coat looks great on the site but it just wasn't for me. Too tight even though correct size by the size chart and just not special enough to justify the price. The fur looked skimpy which I wasn't excited about in the first place. Color is a little lighter than in the photo. I am 5'6 and 125 and bought the small. A medium would have been more comfortable but probably too big in the shoulders etc. Back it went.

I’m a little perplexed by the other 2 reviews on these pjs who stated that these are warm and cozy for winter. I wish only paying customers could review items. “Sweepstake entries” never seem to give honest and accurate reviews. These pajamas are not in the least bit warm. I have no idea why anyone would say that in a review. They are a summer weight pajama. About the same thickness of a t shirt. They’re thinner than I expected. I wish they were cozier. I do like the style, however, the shirt is quite short. Normally I wear an XS (5’3 105lbs for reference). The knot is high enough that about 2-3 inches of skin showed on my stomach above the pants. I’m not comfortable with my stomach exposed so I sent them back to exchange for the small. Overall these pajamas are cute, but I’m a bit disappointed. The other Ugg lounge items I own seem to be of higher quality than this. Im keeping them, but truly they’re just so so.

comments.phra: A comfortable bra with good support that is actually pretty.
The struggle is real when your a 32H. I must have bought & returned 10 bras in the last 2 months. It’s great to find a true fit!! So happy with this one I ordered another!!

comments.summ: Sand (nude) was to sheer for me
comments.phra: Ordered a 30FF in black and sand (nude) They are unlined and because of this, the nude is sheer enough that my areolas were visible even with a shirt on. If you are very light pigmented this may not be a problem for you. This is no Tshirt bra so you can see the seaming though shirts. They did have a nice lift and nice side control to minimize the side projection. They did do a bit of a funny torpedo boob look for me and I did not like that shape, so I ultimately returned them. They were true to size and the material was nice.

comments.summ: I Like Hybrids But Not This Kind!
comments.phra: Fit well but the design was odd, kind of like mullet of bras - rocket boob on the bottom and rounded on the top.

comments.summ: Good basic for less immediate projection
comments.phra: This bra is lovely and seems well-made. It's lightweight/thin, but still has good structure due to the stitching on the cups (although beware that will show through many shirts, this will work best with a camisole). Unfortunately for me, the fit was not right. I got a lot of wrinkling at the bottom center of the cups. I think this was due to insufficient immediate projection in the cups. But if it fits your shape, seems like this will be a great bra!

comments.phra: Great fit, coverage, cool, flattering. Nude is not too pink. Also great under sheer blouses. Can’t beat the price.

I had to size up, I'm typically an X-Small or Small in most brands, but had to size up to a medium for this tank. It looked great on, but once I got about my day, it started to ride up like crazy. I constantly had to readjust this tank, too much of a pain to keep.
Great price for a staple item that is all cotton from Joie. Not all cotton is created equal, this is super soft. It is easy to find a nice white camisole but hard to find off white. I bought 4.

The medium fit pretty well around the bust, waist and hips, in line with most sweaters and tops I buy in size 8 range... however, the cami is cut smaller than in the past, and too tight under the arms for real comfortable wear. I've bought these same camis over the years, it's nice to have a few extra in the drawer. This time the quality wasn't up to par, fabric is much thinner, the trim isn't as nice, and as mentioned, the cut is not quite right. Will look at other brands next time, so Joie is losing me as a loyal, go-to customer.

I wear a size xs in Joie blouses. Ordered the xs here and they are a little snug around the arm pits. Not sure though that the size small would maybe be too big all the way around. Very nicely made. Soft fabric. Looks like online photo. Nice colors.
Great fit, coverage, cool, flattering. Nude is not too pink. Also great under sheer blouses. Can’t beat the price.

comments.phra: A very nice sleep shirt , comfy .
Love it. Very nice and dries beautifully, though I hang mine to dry. You'll like it.

After wearing similar pajamas offered at a hotel recently, I decided I needed my own. This sleep shirt has become my absolute favorite and I wear it every night. It's comfy and soft and looks adorable. On cool mornings I like throwing on light leggings with it to lounge around the house. It's exactly what I was looking for. I could have ordered a size smaller, as it's made to be roomy, but the size I usually wear still works fine. My biggest regret is not ordering another one when they were on sale and still had my size!!

comments.summ: Too boxy and short for my taste
comments.phra: Boxy and short. The fabric is nice and it’s well made but even with my 5’2” height it was not much longer than a top. And the cut is too wide and boxy for my taste. I ended up buying a longer sleep shirt of a silky feeling fabric with a more feminine yet comfortable cut. But this might be just what you are looking for.

comments.phra: AMAZING! The leather is buttery soft and these pants are so flattering. I haven’t had any issues with the zipper falling down (mentioned by other buyers), as of yet. They look great with sneakers or heels and I’ll be wearing them for a long time. Size down for a snug fit as the leather will stretch some. Love love love.

comments.summ: Perfect fit with a little bit of edge
comments.phra: Love the leather. Also love the short front zipper for that added bit of edge. Got them on sale. Great value!

Great quality and fit, leather is soft and very comfortable! This is the bang for the buck item, as most high quality brands are more than 25% more. So many outfits will come out these leather leggings. Love it!

comments.summ: The best gift I gave myself
comments.phra: omg ! These are the MOST FABULOUS LEATHER PANTS ! They are GORGEOUS !!! The leather is Scrumptious and they fit beautiful ! I am 5' tall and I bought a 0 they fit perfectly and I look like a millin bucks ! looks great with my grey leather jacket and grey sparkle fitted turtle neck. You will not want to take them off and you man will want to try becuase you look so sexy classy in them lol.

I have a pair of these leather leggings and love them except for the zipper issue. The zipper has a non-locking slider so they keep coming unzipped. The slider size is a 3 according to the stamp on the back of the slider that’s on their now. You would need to get a replacement with a locking device so it doesn’t fall down. A size 3 slider for a metal zipper. I’m going to try this. I guess it’s pretty simple to swap out. I’Ve been trying to get somewhere with A&O customer service but I’m getting the runaround.

AMAZING! The leather is buttery soft and these pants are so flattering. I haven’t had any issues with the zipper falling down (mentioned by other buyers), as of yet. They look great with sneakers or heels and I’ll be wearing them for a long time. Size down for a snug fit as the leather will stretch some. Love love love.

comments.summ: Perfect fit with a little bit of edge
comments.phra: Love the leather. Also love the short front zipper for that added bit of edge. Got them on sale. Great value!
These are perfect. They hug skin and don’t gap but at the same time cover your rear when you bend over. Highly recommend them!

So, these fit, and feel, like a dream. I got them one size below my usual. They have nice stretch to them, and the elastic at the waistband keeps them up very well. The zipper hasn't given me any problems, but I can see it possibly developing a mind of its own in the future. Without at least a hook, having only a zipper feels slightly risky. Someone else mentioned it kind of "clicking" into place and that appears to be working for me as well. They make a great base to any outfit that aims to involve leather. If you're thinking about these, go for it. They're like opera gloves for your legs...except they don't cover your feet.
After trying many different types of leather pants, I tried these and love. I usually wear a 4 and purchased the 2 and they fit great.

I love these pants, which is why I overlooked the fact that they don't have a button and just open and close with the zipper. I knew that they would fall down because they don't have anything holding them up, but they were on sale and so beautiful that I overlooked it. My mistake. Even when you do go down a size, they fall down and I constantly am pulling them up as I go throughout the day. I plan on taking to a tailor to see if he can do anything, but, in retrospect, I probably should've listened to my gut.

These leather pants are just perfect! Between the smooth buttery leather and the fitting silhouette, they flatter and they feel good. Be sure to order 1 or 2 sizes down depending. I ended up going two sizes down after first trying the 6 and then the 4. Surprisingly the 4 still had a bit of give to it and the 2 fit just right. Bear in mind I am normally a size 6. One caveat, you might need to get them tailored at the bottom depending on your height. I am 5'7" and am considering bringing them up an inch or two to right at the ankle, so they don't scrunch as much on the bottom.

I bought these leather leggings for my holiday work dinner and absolutely love the look and feel. I will caution when buying that you should buy a size smaller than you would normal wear as these do stretch out on first wear.

comments.phra: I’ve had a few Jag jeans over the years. With one wearing, I think that finally these are the perfect design for me. The fit is right on for my high waist and long legs. No sagging, which has been the problem with earlier pull-ons. Fabric soft and good quality. I’m hoping that this performance continues through washing and more wearing without some necessary alterations to cinch the waist to avoid the sag.
Love these jeans but they run a little small. Had to size up to a 6.

I have lots of pairs of Jag Jeans, the no Zipper version and these are different than any other pair I have purchased. First off, this style has an elastic band on the inside waist that is open to rest against the skin. The other pairs I own have a wide band that is the same fabric as the rest of the pant that stretches as you pull them up over your bum. Secondly, this style is made for more of a curvy frame than I have. I’m more boy shaped, so the elastic band gave me a bit of a muffin top and was baggy in the thigh/butt area. On a more positive note, the fabric was very soft.

Love the thickness and quality of the denim. Feels really luxurious. I really wanted these to work but they were too big on me. I ordered a 2 and they were too big. Returned and ordered a 0, but still too loose on me, mostly in the legs and crotch. I usually wear a petite but petite not available.

First pair of jag jeans & I love the quality ,fabric & the pull on waist band is exceptionally comfortable . I appreciated being able to pick an inseam as I have long legs . The denim was a bit dressier than an typical jean but would be good for work or nite out . I will be exchanging for a size down ,they fit slightly larger at waist & I was concerned over time waist band would continue to stretch. I will be ordering the jag denim in other styles & color because of the obvious quality & comfort! Thank you to all the great reviews to help me navigate w/ a new (to me) product.

I’ve had a few Jag jeans over the years. With one wearing, I think that finally these are the perfect design for me. The fit is right on for my high waist and long legs. comments.phra: Fabric felt nice, but the small was SO small. I was afraid that by even going up multiple sizes, it would still be riding up and not fit quite right. Overall, I didn’t feel it was worth the money.
Hanro never disappoints. Gorgeous fabric and made very well. Wonderful tank in an uplifting color! Pricey but on sale a luxury you might indulge!

It’s difficult to give Hanro failing marks; I have owned several pieces from the Touch Feeling line of Hanro, the fabric is deliciously smooth, as is the effect it gives on my body, the fit is superb, but from time I have experienced a ridiculous amount of pilling on the tank shirts. Pilling is caused by friction, I wash mine in a lingerie bag, on gentle, in cold water and I always turn the shirts inside out....well I wore this three times with a well fitted v-neck over it(so no rubbing) well sure enough the amount of pilling made the shirt look like it was years old and mistreated. The reason I buy top quality clothing and shoes is because if you take care of things they will last for years to come,, unfortunately it’s not the case with this. What’s odd is that I own two of the Touch Feeling Crop Tops(bralettes) and they get a lot more than the tanks and yet they never pill.

comments.summ: Hanro is a new find for me and I LOVE!!!
comments.phra: Hanro is a new find for me and I LOVE all their products, especially this tank. Will be buying in every color. Widh Nordstrom carried more of their colors. I’d buy them all. Perfect for wearing on it’s own or perfect for layering!
This is so comfortable. I have several of them in different colors. You can wear them under tee shirts and the tee shirt doesn’t cling to it. It is not hot.
Fabric felt nice, but the small was SO small. I was afraid that by even going up multiple sizes, it would still be riding up and not fit quite right. Overall, I didn’t feel it was worth the money.

I love the entire Touch Feeling line and Hanro is a company known for top quality to 'nth' degree. I own two of these and wish could afford a dozen. I wear mine at least two times a week and have been doingg so for over a year. I have never felt fabric so soft. I was searching for something with a little more support so I will try the next one in a medium, in a color, but you will love the feel against your skin.

About 5 years ago I bought a Hanro Tank Top that looked exactly like this, however it wasn't as costly but I just attributed the cost to rising prices! It fit like a SHAPEWEAR TANK TOP but needed to be replaced so I paid $120. plus tax for this one and ordered 1 size smaller than normal to insure a TIGHT FIT. If you buy it for that reason, you will be disappointed because it isn't tight at all! It does NOT do the job so I sent it back.
If you like yourself .The skin your in .Treat your self to this brand. I always do! Love love the way it feels.

comments.summ: Favorite nursing bra but it runs small!
comments.phra: This bra is super high quality, very comfortable and doesn’t show any lines under t shirts! It does run really small though so I had to exchange my usual size and go up to the next size. The size chart isn’t accurate unfortunately but Nordstrom was great with their return policy.

I love this bra but I have to agree with the other reviewers that the sizing is way off. I am a 32DD or 32DDD, which is a small in the sizing chart. I ordered a medium based on the advice of the other reviewers but I think I could use a large. I am going to keep the medium though, since my boobs will get smaller as I return to my pre-maternity size. The bra is very comfortable and supportive, especially given that there is no underwire.

I bought this when I was still pregnant and loved it. I love the fact that the neck line is straight across, so it doesn't create that awkward, obvious line when wearing thinner or tighter shirts. I know others have said that it is too small but I personally liked the tight feeling since the band is extra thick. It felt more secure and reminded me to sit up straight (haha). But this has one flaw. The wash instruction are so very annoying. I have it in two colors and so far I have been able to get away with machine washing on gentle and hanging to dry. Occasionally, however, I would be in a rush and need to dry on low. The last time this happened, the whole bra completely fell apart. The glue that holds the straps in place deteriorated from the heat (again, dried on low) and the only way I can put it back together is maybe super glue. This is disappointing because of the price point. Ultimately this is my fault but honestly, who hand washes and line dries their everyday bras?!
I wear a small pre-pregnancy and ordered medium per size chart. Even with the band on the last clasps, it's too tight! Too bad, the bra is otherwise great material and feel, just too small "around".

With the amazing reviews I had high hopes for this bra and was counting down the days until it arrived. I am 20 weeks pregnant. I was a 32DDD before pregnancy and have gained about 14 pounds so far. Based on reviews I ordered a large even though the medium was recommended by the size chart. When it arrived it fit too well. Absolutely no room to grow at all, but the fit was good for my current size. I took it into my local Nordstrom and an amazing sales associate (always love Nordstroms customer service!!) took a look at it and we determined together that it would work for a couple months and after pregnancy when my breasts were not engorged. She helped me pick out another bra as well and so we snipped the tags on this one and I wore it out of the store. I had it on for about two hours when I just couldn't take it anymore! The band is so restrictive. There is absolutely no give or stretch to it at all. The inside seam of the band is also very uncomfortable and kept rubbing against my belly. It was so itchy and tight I couldn't take it so I went back right away and returned it. So sad it didn't work out. The material seriously feels like butter- so soft! And the straps were very comfy. I just couldn't handle that inside seam.

These cardigans really do live up to the hype. Soft, cute, and can wear around the house, or out in to the world. If you are on the shorter side, this hits below the knee. Still a good look, and still a win, but do be aware of that
All I can say is if you’ve never had one of these sweaters you are missing out
SO soft and comfy. A little long. I am short, so I will wear with leggings.

comments.summ: I likey, but it hangs in the front
comments.phra: Just received mine & I like it, however, unlike the photo, mine hangs longer in the front than the back. I don't know if after putting cell or whatever in the pocket if it will hang lower if it stretches & it will stretch I believe. I've had other BD & always had this happen. That didn't make me all that happy, but it is SO soft, I love to just snuggle in it & will wear it out. It's longer, but I do like that. I got a Small when I usually am a Medium, so it does run bigger. I'm hoping to see more go on sale. They are a bit too pricey for the fit.

I love Barefoot Dreams. Warm and cozy. Not "scratchy" and easy to launder at home. I am 5'8", weigh 157 lbs and bought a M. Fit true to size. The pretty grey color works as a neutral. The longer length falls mid-thigh on me. I will wear this year around, either as a sweater or as light outerwear.
I finally got my first BFD cardigan. It is so soft and comfortable. The length is perfect. I have worn it several times already.

I love this sweater! I have a few Barefoot Dreams cardigans and this one is by far my new favorite. It is very cozy and also very flattering. It runs big so I sized down and it fits perfectly. I wear it all the time for running errands on the weekend.

This is my fourth Barefoot cardigan. They are so cozy and comfortable. I love the color of this one along with the length, side slits and pockets. I ordered the medium and it fits perfectly. For reference I am 5'4", 140 lbs. These sweaters are great anywhere but they're perfect on a long airplane flight.
Love this brand. The fit is perfect and super soft.
This is an amazing cardigan to throw on and wear around the house, running errands, or to work! Very soft and warm!

DO NOT BUY THIS SWEATER. this was by far the worst purchase I’ve ever made. This sweater is super comfy but it shed EVERYWHERE. I wore this on a flight and it shed all over the plane chair, my white shirt turned black from the fuzz, even the fuzz was clinging to my husbands white shirt. I ended up having to lint roll the plane chair it was so bad. I can not believe other reviewers didn’t have this same problem. It will definitely be returned.

I bought these legging to help with my postpartum pooch. They are really tight in the legs and do offer good support and hold in your gut and love handles. The reason I am giving them 3 stars is because the band rolls down. Every time I bend down to pick up my kid they roll down and I have to adjust. I carry most of my baby weight in the belly and love handles, so it may just be my issue. I am 5'4" and 125lbs.

These leggings are my mainstay! They fit beautifully and never bag! I have had a lot of compliments on them . They hold in all imperfections and come up waist high! They can go casual or formal... great no pill fabric
Beware these run very small. didnt figure it out until I disposed of all tags so no returns

Can’t say enough good things about these leggings! First tried the spanx leggings on and I felt they were see through when bending over even after going up a size. The clerk then had me tried these, love at first try! They suck you in all the right places, don’t feel constricting, lift the bootie, are not see through, and did not need pulled up once after wearing all day shopping! What more could you want in leggings! Love the high waist and the material is great. Buy!! You won’t be disappointed!

Love these leggings! I have 2 pair in the crop style & lived in them all summer! I was happy to see that I could get them in full length. Being short they did have to be shortened but Nordstrom took care of it for me. They look & feel great. Highly recommend this brand.
I’ve tried every brand legging out there and these are by far my favorite. Not see through AT ALL and great tummy control. Also very soft feeling and great stretch!
I love the way these fit and they were nice and thick, however they were see through when I bent down or stretched the fabric at all.

Nice, as you don’t sweat as part cotton but they also don’t fade like cotton. They have great tummy control, although the double band rides up from the inside at times, hopefully in the future they will fix the tummy control part, but they are very nice for the lack of fade, support still provided.

I really liked this shirt. I want to purchase it in more colors . You have to work with it a bit. I purchased a large fit very nicely.
Love this top !! Comfortable AND appropriate for work. I bought the magenta and look forward to wearing it now and throughout the fall/winter.
Too tight. Reviews said it ran large but I didn't find this at all.
Great emerald color! Fits perfect! Very slimming! This shirt is amazing! Great piece!

This top is so cute. I bought it for work but it can transition into evening as well. I’ll be buying more of them. I purchased a medium. I am 5’2”, 135 lbs with a 36 DDD bust. The medium is perfect and the fit is similar to how it fits the model. It’s comfortable too. Definitely a solid purchase.

The style is great and the shirt lays nicely. Fits true to size. However, the cream color is completely see through. You can see the folds in the underlying fabric, as well as any undergarments. I may exchange for another color, but will not be keeping the cream color.
It is a great top. It is a bit more sheer than I thought, but it will be a great staple.
Flattering shirt, great drape. Perfect for work. I found the fabric very comfortable. I received several compliments my first outing. I highly recommend.
This top was really a surprise. I didn’t expect the versatility of it but it’s color and style makes it perfection for all types of work. A must have addition to your closet!
I wore this to a work dinner function and it was classy, modest but sexy. I love how it fits and the color is vibrant. Very flattering.
In cream, the shirt is far more translucent than pictured. Fabric is a bit scratchy.

I agree with the other reviewers. I had high hopes for this blouse- it's so unique looking and feminine - it looks perfect on the model. But, first of all, the material is horrible. It's not even that it is itchy, it is just a horrible, thin, wrinkly, crepe-y material not suitable for a blouse. Further, I bought the appropriate size, but it made me look frumpy -not the polished professional look I was going for. Returning.
Runs large. I'm a 10/12 and the medium was too big and sloppy looking, even when tied close. It was also a very lightweight crepe-y material that I did not like. Returned.
The fabric was itchy and weird, and the tie in the middle was really unflattering. I am a small, but this wouldn’t lay correctly. For all these reasons, I returned it.
Unflattering cut, uncomfortable material. Will be returning.

The top of this shirt is super cute and the color is beautiful and exactly what is shown on screen. The top fits perfectly and the sleeves are long and flattering, even on a 6’ y’all woman with a large bust. However, the bottom of the top is too small and is very oddly cut. It seems as if there is not enough fabric at the bottom to pull the two sides of the wrapped top together. It did not cover my abdomen, and a large usually fits me well. Unfortunately, I had to return the top.

comments.phra: Wit & Wisdom jeans are usually perfect for me as I am 4' 11" with short legs. The 4P ankle skinnies are normally a great fit, but in this case they are not. The inseam is fine, but the leg opening is too large. It it indeed 11" as the description states, but I just measured several of my others in this size and description and the leg opening in those 10" or even slightly less. These 11" leg openings almost look peg-leggy.
I love this pantsuit so comfortable and very nice fabric. Definitely will buy other colors

I ordered an 8P and a 10P, and initially decided to keep the 8P. However I found that they felt a little snug and fit differently than my other wit and wisdom jeans of that same size. I ultimately returned them and decided on the 10P. I like the fit of the 10P. Nice high rise and good quality fabric, perfect ankle length.

comments.phra: Dita Von Teese is the best brand I have found that makes truly interesting bras that are comfortable. I love her designs, because there is a burlesque aspect to them (as she is the most famous burlesque dancer alive), while also being practical. I wear this bra day or night, and I feel confident in it. It also fits perfectly. If you are looking for classic t-shirt bras or something simple, this is not for you. 5/5 stars.

This runs small. I am a 32DD, and both the band and the cup were tight. Also it’s a bit itchy. If this was a bra that I’d be wearing all day I would have returned it, but I bought it as a Valentine’s Day “gift” for my husband and it worked out perfectly. It looks very nice on.
Love this bra! Gorgeous! Just the straps are too small!! I even put an extender to try to keep the bra. Had to return for sizing. I ordered 36DD I need. 40 probably

For an $80 bra, I found this to be extremely itchy and would have returned it for this reason alone. It also seems to fit pretty large - I'm normally somewhere between a 32B and a 32C, and the 32C I ordered had a lot of room in the cups. I had to return it.
Really terrific quality. Looks pretty on, but runs a little small, maybe go a cup size up (should have done DDD vs DD).

I've worn with tape on under for slight support and pair with loose fitting athletic pants and jean jacket. Adds just enough sexy to an outfit when donee right. Also an excellent option for throwing on with leggings and sandals for relaxing around the house or outside.

I wanted to like this cami/top but NO!!! It has zero support and most bras with support worn underneath will show, in the back, straps and front area. Top is cut very very low and is probably best for someone with very firm everything and small sturdy breasts. Although it is best worn alone it has no support coming from the flimsy straps so the girls will bounce around. I purchased to wear as a nude under layer for a sheer lace top and the pinkish nude was a great color for that, but the crop hemline kept riding up with wear. The day I wore it, I had to tug down, pull up and constantly fix the straps from falling. This one was a "Big Fail" for daywear. Maybe for sleeping!
Love the stretchy fit- I’m a 34b and the large straps are loose on me but both sizes work and are crazy comfy. Already have in 2 colors (dif sizes) and LOVE

comments.phra: This dress is gorgeous, so it only gets a low review because of the sizing. Unless you are very busty up top and have no hips, this dress will need substantial alteration to fit! I’m normally a 4 up top and a 6 on the bottom. I snagged an 8 as it was the closest size available. I have several inches to spare in the top, and while the bottom zips, it is plastered to my hips in a very unflattering way. If you love this dress and have to have it, buy for your bottom half, and then get the top altered. This is more bridal sizing than regular. The cut on the bottom is also slimmer (but a size or more) than the Julianna dress in the same fabric.

I just purchased this to wear for my stepson's April wedding in Arizona. I knew it was the dress immediately after I tried it on. It is true to size for the most part. I just need a slight alteration in the waist. I hope I get the opportunity to wear it again as I love it so much.
This dress is beautiful but runs super small. Especially through the hips.
I bought this for my rehearsal dinner - this dress is gorgeous.
This dress is gorgeous! The fabrics is stunning. It runs small, so order one size up.

comments.phra: This skirt is so amazing! Great fabric, colors, and fit! I usually stay away from Topshop because the fit can be off and I feel like I'm contributing to the "fast fashion" meltdown of the environment, but I really loved the photos of this skirt. It's even prettier in person and is a piece that I will be wearing across the seasons! The colors remind me of semiprecious stones, and this really can be worn with an amazing number of other colors: navy, white, chocolate, even burgundy, to name a few. Go buy it!

comments.phra: I was trying to find some basic cotton thongs to wear under my scrubs, so I bought a pair of these to try. I think they'll do just fine. I'm typically a size 2, and I was afraid the S/M dual sizing might be too big, but they're actually fine. There is a little extra room across the front, but I'm sure once I wash and dry them, they will shrink a little like most cotton underwear and then fit perfectly. I've ordered a few more pairs already.

This TTS cotton thong is light and comfortable. It has just the right amount of frontal coverage; they did not sit too high or too low. The soft fabric feels nice against your skin and they have perfect amount of stretch and no side squeeze. So far they have washed well with no shrinkage. I will definitely buy more in the future.

First, these are extremely soft and flex well for working out or everyday use. Second, yes, they are completely worth the money, especially for those like me who are solely thong wearers. I have a large, round butt, but small waist. For those long time thong wearers you know that thongs are comfy IF they fit properly. These finally do. They have enough material length going between the legs so that the waist band can reach up to sit up and over the cheeks (I hope that was described properly). This prevents any wedges. For some reason these days most companies are focusing on the low-rise quality so even when I bought thongs 2 sizes too big for my waist I would still get wedgies while the front was loose and baggie. I bought one as trial, then immediately bought 3 more and will be buying more to stock up in case, god forbid, they discontinue these.

comments.summ: Love so much that I ordered another!
comments.phra: These are perfect, as in soft cotten and sized as is. Highly recommend. I just ordered another pair because I know how hard it can be to find good underwear.
High quality & great fit - true to size.

It's been a very long time since I've worn a thong. Finding one that worked for a slightly older, less taut derriere proved more difficult than expected. The Gossamer is surprisingly comfortable - I seriously forgot I had anything on the first time I wore one. The elastic strap up my crotch works better for me than a wod of fabric, and the smooth, cotton fabric is ideal. The band tends to roll up a bit in the back, but doesn't seem to be noticeable through my clothes. There is just enough fabric in the front to cover (who am I kidding. It's a thong. You don't buy thongs for coverage!) I would buy them again, though I'm still getting used to paying higher prices for undies with less fabric.

comments.summ: Perfect everyday cotton thong, great quality.
comments.phra: I replaced all my old thongs with this style after trying out a few pairs. The cotton is smooth and the edges don't pinch. It is the most comfortable panty I have ever worn. I'm 5'3", 120 lbs and got size S/M. I'm usually a Small so the S/M size is comfortable with lots of stretch left for those on the Medium end of the spectrum. It is a quality garment. I bought over a week's worth in black and beige. I had trouble with cheap undies with a narrow crotch that resulted in awful front-wedgies but the Cabana style offers great coverage. The point where the thong and waistband meet is sewn and makes a very subtle sweetheart shape (does that make sense?) which is very flattering.

comments.phra: Great top, lightweight, wicks well, super comfy, fun patter

I never write reviews, but just had to say how chuffed I was when this arrived in the post. As a size 8/10 with a 28H chest, finding flattering sports tops has been a nightmare - either I look like I might topple over with a top that fits my waist or I cover up with huge tshirts that hang off my chest. This, however, is beautiful. It fits amazingly in a size M (only .5cm of sports bra showing either side) and shows off my waist with high waisted leggings or running shorts. The pattern is lovely and i can see it pairing with everything. LOVE the high neck and fully covered back which hides the architechtural structure that is my sports bra and I am so excited to wear it to more classes. This is my first purchase from Sweaty Betty and I will 100% be back for more!
I bought this to wear under loose top for Barre class and it is great as it is a good fit and doesn’t ride up. I wore my sports bra underneath for support as I run to class.
I don’t usually wear gym items that show off my stomach but this top is just long enough that it doesn’t feel like i’m just wearing a bra. Super cute and comfortable.

comments.summ: Lovely to match leggings but the logo isn’t on it!
comments.phra: Bought this to go with the power leggings and it’s a bit disappointing for the price. I’ve tried these before but had to size up and there’s no “SB LDN” logo on the reverse as there is in the models picture here so it’s just plain. The fit still is slightly odd and I think you’d need a bra to go under so overall a bit overpriced for a simple thin crop top like top! Lovely colours as always though, but it’s odd the logo has disappeared?

Overall it's is a darling, long, comfortable, and casual dress. I plan to wear it to a casual outdoor bridal luncheon for a wedding in upstate New York in early September. Good job as always, Nordstrom.

Beautiful, comfy dress for an upcoming outdoor wedding! I bought navy in medium and large- I am 5’7”, 150 lbs and 60 yrs old. Both sizes fit but the “60 yrs old” led me appropriately to the not-as-clingy large it is perfect! Best part— no high heels needed with a maxi! If you have a few areas that are not as fit as you’s like, size up.

Highly recommend this basic ‘timeless’ dress. Although it a maxi, it is not too long even with wearing low-heeled sandals, does not need to altered one bit. Am 5’5” bought a medium, fits nicely, not too snug yet comfortable.
Feel very statuesque wearing this dress, which is a bit unusual for a maxi style. Material drapes nicely. Love the navy color.

Good job as always, Nordstrom.

Beautiful, comfy dress for an upcoming outdoor wedding! I bought navy in medium and large- I am 5’7”, 150 lbs and 60 yrs old. Both sizes fit but the “60 yrs old” led me appropriately to the not-as-clingy large it is perfect! Best part— no high heels needed with a maxi! If you have a few areas that are not as fit as you’s like, size up.
Simple and cute. I got the bright pink color. I’m not expecting it to last many years— the fabric is a bit thin— but it looks great for now.

Cute dress. At 5’6”, 140 lbs, the medium fit well. It’s ankle length, and has cute ruching to help hide the belly. I have a bit of a belly, so even with the ruching, it’s a little tight - still keeping it, though. It’s nice quality bottom is lined, which is helpful.
This dress fits true to size. It’s very flattering.

I was looking for a fitted basic maxi and this fit my criteria but I was even more pleasantly surprised when it arrived. I have a curvy figure so it is very flattering. I am 58 so I wanted a dress age appropriate but not ‘grandma’ looking. Very happy with my choice!
